instructions: Combine water, sriracha, soy sauce, garlic, sugar, and honey in a saucepan, and bring to boil
Whisk together 2 tbsp cornstarch and 2 tbsp water until dissolved, and add to saucepan. Reduce to low heat
Dice chicken and coat in cornstarch
Heat oil in a skillet, and sautee coated chicken
Combine chicken and sauce, and add red peppers to taste
name: Honey Sriracha Chicken

instructions: Heat 1 tsp oil in large pan over high heat
Add broccoli, mushrooms, and bell pepper to pan, and cook until tender (5-6 minutes)
Remove vegetables from heat, cover, and set aside
Add chicken and 1 tbsp oil to pan on high heat
Cook chicken through, then add garlic and vegetables
Whisk together chicken broth, sugar, soy sauce, sesame oil, and cornstarch
Pour sauce over chicken mixture, and simmer until sauce thickens
name: Garlic Chicken Stir Fry

instructions: Mix margarine, powdered sugar, and 1 cup flour
Pat into 8x8 pan and bake for 30 minutes at 350F
Mix eggs, 2 tbsp flour, baking power, sugar, lemon juice, and lemon rind and pour onto crust
Bake for 25 more minutes at 350F
name: Lemon Bars

instructions: Mix sugar, margarine, and evaporated milk over medium heat until sugar dissolves
Boil for 5 minutes, stirring constantly
Remove pan from heat and add marshmallow cream and chocolate chips
Stir until chocolate is dissolved
Pour into greased pan and let cool in refrigerator
name: Marshmallow Fudge
